description:
When the gang sees a sleep-deprived Amami stumbling down the
street, they worry her inability to ignore her spectral friends is
putting her heath at risk. They decide to speak with her father Asahi,
who digs up a special pair glasses capable of blocking Amami`s sixth
sense.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: にぎやかな, 年明けです.
